content.body:
coincidence. Someone thought it would be cute to embed the NetHack rumors file in the source as part of unit test for base64 encoding
https://nethackwiki.com/wiki/Source:NetHack_3.1.0/rumors.fal#:~:text=You%20offend%20Shai%2DHulud
It's been in there for a looong time: https://hg-edge.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/rev/4231ddd5f31aacd9345c972aff00b25e15fc6de7#l110.1813 (2008)
... but you gave me a good scare

Hah, in fact, that text was present in the original "Free the lizard" 1998-03-28 check-in.
https://hg-edge.mozilla.org/projects/nspr/annotate/a4b34919bf34db2ee22acbbc305693c8980b6dc6/lib/tests/base64t.c#l1790
